attributes.action: Bring legal aid back to child contact cases
attributes.additional_details: To deny the people a equal and fair representation is to deny children the right to be brought up by both parents,  currently the legal aid system has effectively destroyed the chances of the majority of non resident parents to even see their children.
attributes.background: Children are suffering nationally because fathers who can't afford to pay for representation are overwhelmed by the civil legal system.. If one party receives legal representation ... So should the other..

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the rules on eligibility for legal aid to be changed.
